NavBar.deadline: Fecha Límite / Duración de la Campaña

example.publicInfo: Esta información se mostrará públicamente, así que ten precaución con la información que compartas aquí.
example.deadline: Fecha Límite / Duración de la Campaña

import.content: // Add your translations here if needed

example.message: You are free to donate any amount you wish. Your donation will be allocated to the project you have chosen. Your donation does not imply the acquisition of shares or participation in the projects, but it grants you access to exclusive benefits.
example.message2: When making a donation with Solana, you are making a voluntary contribution to support projects and causes that interest you. Your donation does not imply the acquisition of shares or participation in the funded projects.
example.message3: We utilize Solana's blockchain technology to ensure the security and transparency of your donations. Transactions with Solana are fast and secure, providing you with peace of mind when making your contribution.
